Progress Indicator

Example
70% Complete

Usage notes

The progress indicator is built with two (bootstrap) HTML elements, some CSS to set the width, and a few attributes. The class "progress" as a wrapper to indicate the max value of the progress bar. We use the inner class "progress-bar" to indicate the progress so far. The lass "progress-bar" requires an inline style, utility class, or custom CSS to set it's width. The progress-bar also requires some role and aria attributes to make it accessible.
